name: Toki Woki
description:
Cooperation is the name of the game in TokiWoki. Each player controlls one leg and together you can tilt the torso. Are you able to reach the goal?

This project was developped during the Inbetween Animation and Game Desing at the Fantoche 2021.

Creators
Alex Lopez | Programming | linktree
Emerson Suter | Programming
Dominic Sutter | 2D Art, Sound Design
Kristina Rieder | 3D Art, Game Design | itch.io
